title: 🚨 Juventus and Real Madrid 'agree' Cristiano Ronaldo deal

replies.msg:
🚨 Juventus and Real Madrid 'agree' Cristiano Ronaldo deal


Jul 10, 2018 10:19 PM
Juventus have agreed a deal with Real Madrid for the transfer of Cristiano Ronaldo and an official announcement could be made in a matter of hours.

That’s according to various reports in Spain, which claim that the 33-year-old will soon complete his move to the Bianconeri for €100m and is expected to sign a
four-year deal.



牙朗

踢左咁耐冇功都有勞，你走之前一定會幫你搞個好好睇睇既farewell
真心唔太捨得，第時踢意甲冇咩機會再睇
